shieldbase.name: Train Cow Catcher
shieldbase.lore: Massive locomotive cow catcher converted into a shield. Locomotion ability allows sustained charge with ethereal train.
shieldbase.special_effect: Locomotion: sustained charge with ethereal train

shieldbase.name: Cadet Academy Shield
shieldbase.lore: Standard issue shield for Christmas Elf academy cadets. Bears the academy insignia.

shieldbase.name: Sleigh Shield
shieldbase.lore: Crafted from reinforced sleigh materials, used by elite delivery units.

shieldbase.name: Poinsettia Shield
shieldbase.lore: Beautiful yet durable shield with poinsettia patterns. Favored by officers.

shieldbase.name: Pancake Shield
shieldbase.lore: Surprisingly resilient breakfast-themed shield. Light and easy to carry.

shieldbase.name: Wafer Shield
shieldbase.lore: Delicate-looking but surprisingly sturdy cookie wafer shield.

shieldbase.name: Saucer Shield
shieldbase.lore: Tea saucer repurposed as a shield. Perfect for afternoon tea defense.

shieldbase.name: Cutting Board
shieldbase.lore: Heavy wooden cutting board used by Foodkin chefs for defense.

shieldbase.name: Gingerbread Shield
shieldbase.lore: Festive shield that smells of cinnamon and holiday spices.

shieldbase.name: Cookie Shield
shieldbase.lore: Chocolate chip cookie shield that can shoot bursts of chocolate chips to stagger weak enemies.
shieldbase.special_effect: Shoots chocolate chips to stagger enemies

shieldbase.name: Dark Chocolate Shield
shieldbase.lore: Massive shield made of hardened dark chocolate. Surprisingly durable.

shieldbase.name: Snowflake Shield
shieldbase.lore: Delicate ice-crafted shield with intricate snowflake patterns.

shieldbase.name: Whale Bone Shield
shieldbase.lore: Light shield crafted from whale bones found along icy shores.

shieldbase.name: Imp Wing Shield
shieldbase.lore: Crafted from 25 ice imp wings. Earned through perseverance against the frozen pests.

shieldbase.name: Frosted Bark Shield
shieldbase.lore: Shield made from the bark of ancient frost-resistant trees.

shieldbase.name: Sled Shield
shieldbase.lore: Reinforced sled converted into a massive defensive barrier.

shieldbase.name: Frostbite Mirror
shieldbase.lore: End-game legendary shield. Polished ice that reflects attacks and freezes opponents.

shieldbase.name: Toy Box Lid
shieldbase.lore: Sturdy lid from a child's toy chest. Surprisingly effective defense.

shieldbase.name: Gear Shield
shieldbase.lore: Interlocking gears that can rotate to deflect attacks at angles.

shieldbase.name: Stained Glass Shield
shieldbase.lore: Beautiful stained glass artwork mounted on a sturdy frame.

shieldbase.name: Diamond Card
shieldbase.lore: Playing card shield with diamond suit pattern. Light and quick.

shieldbase.name: Twilight Great Shield
shieldbase.lore: Massive stained glass shield depicting a twilight scene.

shieldbase.name: Sunset Great Shield
shieldbase.lore: Grand stained glass shield showing a beautiful sunset panorama.

shieldbase.name: Expenda-Man Shield
shieldbase.lore: Futuristic shield that fires a flamethrower with area-of-effect floor damage.
